resources.string:
Download the Sporza app to see this view in action.
You can download the Sporza Voetbal app in the Android and Apple stores. Search for Sporza Voetbal. The app now appears at the top of your search results.
If this fails open up a browser and paste in the following link. 
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=be.vrt.mobile.android.sporza.voetbal
